pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations

Class Conversation.ConversationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations.Conversation.ConversationBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Conversation

    public static class Conversation.ConversationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The builder used to create conversations. forWhom() and prompts() must be called before building
    Author:
    Mazen Kotb
    See Also:
    forWhom(Chat), prompts()

      • conservationTimeout

        public Conversation.ConversationBuilder conservationTimeout(long timeout)
        Timeout in seconds for the conversation to be finished. If the conversation is not finished, it will be ended.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in seconds
        Returns:
        this builder

      • conversationTimeout

        public Conversation.ConversationBuilder conversationTimeout(long timeout,
                                                            SendableMessage message)
        Timeout in seconds for the conversation to be finished. If the conversation is not finished, it will be ended and the message provided will be sent.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in seconds
        message - Message to be sent if the conversation is timed out
        Returns:
        this builder

        public Conversation.ConversationBuilder endText(java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> textPredicate)

        Parameters:
        textPredicate - The predicate for deciding whether to end the conversation
        Returns:
        this builder

        public Conversation.ConversationBuilder endingMessage(SendableTextMessage message)
        The message that is sent when the conversation ends. Not to be confused with endText which is the text that if sent by the user, the conversation will be ended.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be sent when the conversation ends.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • userFilter

        public Conversation.ConversationBuilder userFilter(java.util.function.Predicate<User> predicate)
        Add a user filter to the conversation. Predicate is called before any prompts are called, if returned true the prompts will be called, otherwise it won't
        Parameters:
        predicate - user filter
        Returns:
        this builder
